newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Taleban accept conditional ceasefire with foes.
newsitem.headline: Taleban accept conditional ceasefire with foes.

text.p: The radical Islamic Taleban militia has conditionally accepted a proposed ceasefire with its foes north of Kabul, a Taleban official said on Monday.

Syed Mohammed Haqqani, a Taleban spokesman in the southern Afghan city of Kandahar, said a ceasefire offer from Uzbek militia chief General Abdul Rashid Dostum, conveyed on Sunday by Pakistani Interior Minister Naseerullah Babar, had been accepted on condition that it be followed by an exchange of prisoners.
